00015 
00016 bool SACMethodMSAC::computeModel(){
00017 
00018         // Warn and exit if no threshold was set
00019         if (this->threshold == -1)
00020         {
00021                 cout<<"[MSAC::computeModel] No threshold set!"<<endl;
00022                 return (false);
00023         }
00024 
00025         this->iterations = 0;
00026         double minResidualPenaltyFound = DBL_MAX;
00027         double k = 1.0;
00028 
00029         std::vector<int> bestModelInliersFound;
00030         Eigen::VectorXd estimatedModelCoefficients;
00031         std::vector<double> distances;
00032 
00033         int noInliersCurrentModel = 0;
00034         // Iterate
00035         while (this->iterations < k)
00036         {
00037                //Compute a random model from the input pointcloud
00038                bool isDegenerate = false;
00039                bool modelFound = false;
00040 
00041                this->objectModel->computeRandomModel(this->iterations,estimatedModelCoefficients,isDegenerate,modelFound);
00042 
00043                if (!isDegenerate) break;
00044 
00045                if(!modelFound){
00046                    this->iterations++;
00047                    continue;
00048                }
00049 
00050                 double currentResidualPenalty = 0;
00051                 // Iterate through the 3d points and calculate the distances from them to the model
00052                 this->objectModel->getDistancesToModel (estimatedModelCoefficients, distances);
00053                 for (size_t i = 0; i < distances.size (); ++i)
00054                         currentResidualPenalty += std::min (distances[i], this->threshold);
00055 
00056                 // Better match ?
00057                 if (currentResidualPenalty < minResidualPenaltyFound)
00058                 {
00059                         minResidualPenaltyFound = currentResidualPenalty;
00060 
00061                         // Save the current model/coefficients selection as being the best so far
00062                         this->modelCoefficients = estimatedModelCoefficients;
00063 
00064                         noInliersCurrentModel = 0;
00065                         // Need to compute the number of inliers for this model to adapt k
00066                         for (size_t i = 0; i < distances.size (); ++i)
00067                                 if (distances[i] <= this->threshold)
00068                                         noInliersCurrentModel++;
00069 
00070                         // Compute the k parameter (k=log(z)/log(1-w^n))
00071                         double w = (double)((double)noInliersCurrentModel / (double)this->objectModel->getInputCloud()->getSize());
00072                         double pNoOutliers = 1 - pow (w, (double)this->objectModel->getNumberOfSamplesRequired());
00073                         pNoOutliers = std::max (std::numeric_limits<double>::epsilon (), pNoOutliers);       // Avoid division by -Inf
00074                         pNoOutliers = std::min (1 - std::numeric_limits<double>::epsilon (), pNoOutliers);   // Avoid division by 0.
00075                         k = log (1 - this->probability) / log (pNoOutliers);
00076                 }
00077 
00078                 this->iterations++;
00079 
00080                 if (this->iterations > this->maxIterations)
00081                 {
00082 
00083                                 cout<<"[MSAC::computeModel] MSAC reached the maximum number of trials."<<endl;
00084                         break;
00085                 }
00086         }
00087 
00088         // Iterate through the 3d points and calculate the distances from them to the model again
00089         this->objectModel->getDistancesToModel (this->modelCoefficients, distances);
00090 
00091         this->inliers.resize (distances.size ());
00092         // Get the inliers for the best model found
00093         noInliersCurrentModel = 0;
00094         for (size_t i = 0; i < distances.size (); ++i)
00095                 if (distances[i] <= this->threshold)
00096                         this->inliers[noInliersCurrentModel++] = i;
00097 
00098         // Resize the inliers vector
00099         this->inliers.resize (noInliersCurrentModel);
00100 
00101         if (this->inliers.size () == 0)
00102         {
00103                 cout<<"[MSAC::computeModel] Unable to find a solution!"<<endl;
00104                 return (false);
00105         }
00106 
00107         return (true);
00108 
00109 }
00110 
00111 }
